table.name: vtiger_salesorderproductsrel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesorderproductsrel` ( `salesorderworkflowstagesid` int(11) NOT NULL, `salesorderid` varchar(100) default NULL, `productid` varchar(100) default NULL, `productcomboid` varchar(100) default NULL, `producttype` varchar(100) default NULL, `marketprice` decimal(25) default NULL, `realmarketprice` decimal(25) default NULL, `costing` decimal(25) default NULL, `realcosting` decimal(25) default NULL, `productform` text default NULL, `auditorid` varchar(100) default NULL, `audittime` varchar(100) default NULL, `createtime` varchar(100) default NULL, `creatorid` varchar(100) default NULL, `status` varchar(100) default NULL, `remark` varchar(1000) default NULL, `relatorids` varchar(1000) default NULL, `ownerid` varchar(100) default NULL, `backerid` varchar(100) default NULL, `backtime` varchar(100) default NULL, `backwhy` varchar(1000) default NULL, `servicecount` int(2) default NULL, `serviceamount` decimal(25) default NULL, `schedule` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesorderworkflowstagesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
